title: Arabic 31
text: Bring thyself to account each day ere thou art summoned to a reckoning; for death, unheralded, shall come upon thee and thou shalt be called to give account for thy deeds.

prev.title: Arabic 30
prev.text: Deny not My servant should he ask anything from thee, for his face is My face; be then abashed before Me.

next.title: Arabic 32
next.text: I have made death a messenger of joy to thee. Wherefore dost thou grieve? I made the light to shed on thee its splendor. Why dost thou veil thyself therefrom?
